welcomePhrase: Glad you’ve come over! I love playdates! And today, I’ve got something so cool, so different for us to do. Would you like to follow me?
welcomeBackPhrase: Welcome back to Samurai Chef, %Title%! I'm excited to see what Sensei has in store for us next.
fallbackPhrase: Sorry, I don't understand what you're saying. Would you like some help?
failurePhrase: You lose current round. Would you like to try again or start new mission?
failureRePromptPhrase: Sorry, I don't understand what you're saying. Would you like to try again or start new mission?
wonPhrase: You won current round. Are you ready to start next competition?
wonRePromptPhrase: Sorry, I don't understand what you're saying. Are you ready to start?
readyToStartRePromptPhrase: Sorry, I don't hear you. Ready to start?
justEarnCorrectQuestionPhrase: Wow, you got some Secret Sauce! When you use it, Sensei will accept any answer as correct!
justWearCorrectQuestionPhrase: Sweet! With the Secret Sauce your answer was considered right, no matter what you said!
justEarnSecondChancePhrase: Nice, you earned a Super Spatula! With it you'll get a second chance the first time you give a wrong answer.
justWearSecondChancePhrase: Good idea using the Super Spatula to get a second chance at responding!
selectMissionPhrase: There are three different paths to choose from: Path of Chef, Path of Sumo, and Path of Guru. They all have fun ways of cooking and eating food. Which one do you want to try?
selectMissionUnknownPhrase: I don't understand your choice, Please, select one of three available missions.
missionAlreadyCompletePhrase: You have already complete this mission.
severalValuesPhrase: Sorry, we can't understand your answer. Please, choose one from this list
wantStartMissionPhrase: Do you want to start a new mission?
wantExitPhrase: Do you want to quit the game?
repeatLastPhrase: I don't understand you. Please, repeat last command.
exitPhrase: We had fun together. Let's do this again soon.
returnToGamePhrase: You'll be returned to game process.
wantResetProgressPhrase: Are you sure you want to quit the path and lose all your progress?
wantMissionFromBeginningPhrase: Do you want to start the path from the beginning?
helpCompetitionRulesPhrase: In a competition, you and Mary take turns trying to provide the correct answer. The first one to lose two rounds by answering incorrectly loses.
helpMissionLowDescriptionPhrase: In Path of the Chef your goal is to master the art of cooking sushi! When you are given an ingredient or food, say the right response to prepare it correctly! You are currently on stripe #. Do you want to continue playing?
helpMissionMidDescriptionPhrase: In Path of the Sumo your goal is to become big and heavy! When you are given a food to eat, say the right response to eat it correctly! You are currently on stripe #. Do you want to continue playing?
helpMissionHighDescriptionPhrase: In Path of the Guru you'll learn the ways of nutritious food! When you are given an ingredient or food, say the right response to prepare it correctly! You are currently on stripe #. Do you want to continue playing?
helpNewWordsPhrase: Do you need to hear the correct response to all the words again?
helpGeneralPhrase: In Samurai Chef your goal is to earn different belts in three unique paths to become the ultimate samurai chef! You'll also earn cool titles and other awesome rewards along the way!
helpLearnMorePhrase: Do you want to learn more about the game and objectives?
helpContinuePlayingPhrase: Do you want to continue playing?
redirectedToSelectMissionPhrase: You will be redirected to mission selection.
